newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - May 20.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - May 20.

text.p: These are significant items in the Ivorian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these items and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Ivorian Director General of Customs says fraud is being reduced since his arrival at the head of Customs six months ago; Adama Coulibaly forecasts customs revenue to reach 650 billion CFA
- Ivoirian government lost 10 billion CFA in 1996 in the textile industry because of fraud. Noel Guetat, Cabinet Director at the Ministry of Trade says the era of untouchables is over.
